system.description: When you spend Data (knowledge of secret truths) to gain advantage, choose one and describe how the information helps:

success.label: Choose One
success.value:
• Take +1 Forward on your next roll
• Ask the GM a specific question about the situation
• Reveal a useful detail about someone or something
• Create an opening or opportunity

system.choices:
• Take +1 Forward on your next roll
• Ask the GM a specific question about the situation
• Reveal a useful detail about someone or something
• Create an opening or opportunity
